game.name: Little Nightmares
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Cloud, Remote Play on TV, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Little Nightmares에서 당신이 어린 시절에 겪었던 공포들과 마주하게 될 공포스럽고도 기묘한 이야기를 경험하세요! 미쳐버린 영혼들이 다음 먹이를 찾아 헤매고 있는 목구멍이라는 이름의 거대하고 신비한 배에서, 여섯 개의 탈출을 도와주세요.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Take on the role of Six, a lone child lost in a massive metal vessel known as the Maw, surrounded by dangerous, distorted versions of adults. You’ll need to do your best to escape in one piece or your fate will be worse than you ever dared dream.

reviewHighlights.text: Little Nightmares is a short but unforgettable journey dripping with atmosphere. The creepy visuals and sound design constantly make you feel vulnerab...
8.6/10 I've always felt Little Nightmares shares a kindred spirit with INSIDE—perhaps the developers were inspired by PLAYDEAD's work to some extent....
